column4: I have use this ftp script http://pastebin.com/se6zDMXr how can I add a line that creates a logfile after filetransfer?
Just pipe the output into a text file. I suggest reading a book on shell scripts...
in order to do this I need to google on bash script that creates logfiles or ftp that creates logfiles?
You need to read about piping output - it's a general principle, not specific to FTP. Bash scripting works by chaining lots of utilities together
